metadata.title: CVE-2016-4313 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in unzip/extract feature in eXtplorer2.1.9 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot)in an archive file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extplorer - 2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u4ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: extplorer package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u4ubuntu0.16.04.1').
